alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Leavenworth; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 4:46PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Wyandotte, south central Leavenworth and north central Johnson Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 446 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bonner Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shawnee, Bonner Springs, Basehor, Edwardsville, Lake Quivira, Kansas City, Muncie, Maywood, Piper, Holliday and Beverly Hills. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 410 and 416. Interstate 435 between mile markers 6 and 16. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 220 and 226. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
